price: 57. Mpe tolongisaki ye na libota lia ye, longola sé mwasi naye, totiyaki ye kati ya baye tobomaki.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرۡنَٰهَا مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu qaddarnāhā mina al-ghābirīna
